alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:02AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Searcy and southern Marion Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 501 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Pindall, or 12 miles southwest of Yellville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maumee... Duff... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Morning Star... Lone Pine... Cozahome... Mull... Harriet... Maumee Crossing... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations
